snippet: Michael Drewniak, who previously served as Mr. Christie’s chief spokesman, appeared before a grand jury in Newark on Friday to answer questions about the George Washington Bridge lane closing scandal.
abstract: Michael Drewniak, chief spokesman for New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, appears before a grand jury to answer questions about the George Washington lane closing scandal.
lead_paragraph: Michael Drewniak, who previously served as Mr. Christie’s chief spokesman, appeared before a grand jury in Newark on Friday to answer questions about the George Washington Bridge lane closing scandal.

headline.main: Grand Jury Questions Christie Aide in an Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Questions Christie Aide in an Inquiry
